metadata.name: CIEGA from the series HODT
metadata.description:
Las luces de mis errores nos traen aquí, atraviesan el pecho y llenan mis ojos de fuego buscando el futuro - 
VAL SCHNACK

-------  
CIEGA from the series HODT

Scanned 120mm negative film, this piece exists in physical form as a print with handwriting.  
-------

'Herself and Other Difficult Tasks' is a poetic visual diary that explores the photographer’s states of vulnerability and growing pains. It contains a selection of photographs taken between 2020 and 2022, which somewhat organizes a non-linear journey that she goes through during the lapse of time where her sense of self was cracked open and dislocated to create space for re-recognition. 
words by Mana Pinto
